name: Learning Alphabets
description:
Learning Alphabets is an educational game app specially design and develop for preschoolers and toddlers to learn English alphabets (A-Z) easily without any hassle.

We are working on series of child educational development games to facilitate parents.
Your kids will enjoy playing with this app and will definitely learn Alphabets by popping balloons.

◆◆◆ FEATURES ◆◆◆
► Single tapping Easy game
► Colorful Balloons
► Random Alphabets
► Alphabets Vocals

Stay connected with DGameStudio for betterment of your kids.

◆◆◆ JOIN US ◆◆◆
Like us on Facebook and Follow us on Twitter to stay updated with DGameStudio. Play and enjoy our games because every game is filled with creativity, enjoyment and learning for kids.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dgamestudios/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/dgamestudios/

◆◆◆ KIDS REVIEWS ◆◆◆
your suggestions & feedback are precious for us; it helps us to keep working on innovative ideas. If you like our games please rate us and give reviews. So we can keep improving with quality free games.

◆◆◆ DISCLAIMER ◆◆◆
This app is ad supported and may contain ads.
